code: import{createAsyncThunk}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export const fetchSeenNews=createAsyncThunk('user/fetchSeenNews',async function(userID){let curretBody={userID:userID};let response=await fetch('https://portal.softcom.ua/php/newsviews.php',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(curretBody)});let result=await response.json();return result;});
